# Meteor Storm Procedures In the event of a meteor storm affecting the station, the station alert should be set to [color=#c8a404]Yellow Alert[/color] until the meteor storm damage/event is over.
1. Station personnel are to report damages and assist injured crew when possible.
2. Repair activities should be prioritized for immediate/severe damage areas, and should not be done to low-impacted areas until after the event is over.
3. All personnel performing EVA/shuttle activity (primarily Cargo Department) should return until the meteor storm event is over.
4. Engineering Personnel should repair all damages with location assistance from crew, when the meteor storm is over.
5. In the event that the station damage is too severe, the evacuation shuttle should be called.
6. In the event of the meteor storm remaining prolonged in time, immediate evacuation may be requested from Central Command.
